Package plateau.role

package plateau.role
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    plateau
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Fighter
    The Fighter role adds 1 to each die roll when attacking a zombie.
    Healer
    The Healer role represents a survivor with the ability to heal other survivors.
    Lucky
    The Lucky role represents a survivor with the ability to roll an extra die when attacking a zombie.
    Role
     
    Snooper
    The Snooper role allows the survivor to perform a free search action every turn.
